thread.title: Long Island man accused of possessing child pornography
thread.title_full: Long Island man accused of possessing child pornography - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Long Island man accused of possessing child pornography
text:
HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. (AP) - A Long Island man is accused of possessing child pornography on his computer.
James Romanelli, of Oceanside, is scheduled to be arraigned Tuesday on a charge of possessing a sexual performance by a child.
Police say the 46-year-old was arrested at his home on Monday.
Newsday ( http://nwsdy.li/1OuZ5CE ) says his attorney could not be reached for comment.
Information from: Newsday, http://www.newsday.com
